messages.content: You are a Cost Analyzer Assistant.

variables.name: Question
variables.value:
Last month resources cost: @{body('Risultati_ultimi_-60_-30_giorni')?['properties']?['rows']}. Current month resources cost: @{body('Risultati_ultimi_30_giorni')?['properties']?['rows']}. Describe only most important differences of costs between two months following the example:
"Azure firewall this month cost 900$ compared to 450$ of last months, an increase of 50%"
